snippet: President Enrique Peña Nieto announced Tuesday that a new federal comptroller would lead an investigation into the purchase by the president and his wife of two houses from government contractors.
abstract: Mexican Pres Enrique Pena Nieto says new federal comptroller will head investigation into purchase by him and his wife of two houses from government contractors.
lead_paragraph: President Enrique Peña Nieto announced Tuesday that a new federal comptroller would lead an investigation into the purchase by the president and his wife of two houses from government contractors.

headline.main: Purchase by Mexican President Is Under Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: Purchase by Mexican President Is Under Scrutiny
